Sentencas: A molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell (MHDCFC) is a promising electricity generation technology.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: Anode behavior significantly affects the cell performance.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: Intermittent fuel supply is a bottleneck restricting the commercialization of the cell.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: An MHDCFC with fuel continuously supplied is proposed in this study.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: Anode structural parameters are optimized through a computational fluid dynamics (CFD) model and a current model.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: The optimized current collector thickness, inlet number, inlet diameter are 0.2 cm, two, and 6 mm based on reactant distribution uniformity and current.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: Then, a membrane-less cell is built.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: Influence of carbon type, particle size, carbon mass fraction, and temperature on the cell performance are investigated.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: The cell fueled with activated carbon holding relatively large specific surface area and high conductivity achieve a higher performance.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: A relative small carbon mass fraction and large particle size decrease the charge transfer resistance and improve the cell performance.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: The cell may obtain a higher performance at 390 degrees C comparing with that under 400 degrees C.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: The cell exhibits a power about 21 mW when activated carbon mass fraction, particle size, and temperature are respectively of 3.33%, 0.5-0.85 mm, and 390 degrees C.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study

Sentencas: The model and experiment demonstrate the feasibility of a continuous MHDCFC operating at a low temperature.
Titulo: A membrane-less molten hydroxide direct carbon fuel cell with fuel continuously supplied at low temperatures: A modeling and experimental study
